headline: S&P Global to Present at Barclays 23rd Annual Global Financial Services Conference on September 9, 2025
summary: Martina Cheung, President and Chief Executive Officer of S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI), will participate in Barclays 23rd Annual Global Financial Services Conference on September 9, 2025 in New York, New York. Ms. Cheung is scheduled to speak from 12:00 p.m. to 12:40 p.m. (Eastern Daylight Time). The "fireside chat" will be webcast and may include forward-looking information. headline: 3 Reasons We Love S&P Global (SPGI)
summary: S&P Global currently trades at $548.65 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a middling return of 3.7%. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 10.5% gain during that period.
